get.summary: Allows you to retrieve, add and update payroll employees in a Xero organisation
Allows you to retrieve, add and update payroll employees in a Xero organisation
Allows you to retrieve, add and update Payroll leave applications in a Xero organisation
Allows you to retrieve, add, update and delete Payroll Items in a Xero organisation
Allows you to retrieve and add Payroll Calendars in a Xero organisation

parameters.name: If-Modified-Since
parameters.description: Only records created or modified since this timestamp will be returned

parameters.name: page
parameters.description: e.g. page=1 – Up to 100 records will be returned in a single API call

get.summary: Allows you to retrieve, add and update pay runs in a Xero organisation

parameters.name: If-Modified-Since
parameters.description: Only records created or modified since this timestamp will be returned

parameters.name: page
parameters.description: e.g. page=1 – Up to 100 records will be returned in a single API call

get.summary: Allows you to retrieve, add and update pay runs in a Xero organisation
Allows you to retrieve and update payslips in a Xero organisation
Allows you to retrieve and update payslips in a Xero organisation
Allows you to retrieve the Payroll settings of a Xero organisation
Allows you to retrieve, add and update Payroll Super Funds in a Xero organisation
Allows you to retrieve, add and update Payroll Super Funds in a Xero organisation
Allows you to retrieve, add and update Payroll Timesheet in a Xero organisation
Allows you to retrieve, add and update Payroll Timesheet in a Xero organisation

DateOfBirth.description: Date of birth of the employee (YYYY-MM-DD)

StartDate.description: If you aren’t sure of the exact start date for an employee, you can just enter the start of the current financial year (YYYY-MM-DD)

MiddleNames.description: Middle name(s) of the employee (max length = 35)

Email.description: The email address for the employee (max length = 100)

TwitterUserName.description: Employee’s twitter name, entered as @twittername (max length = 50)

IsAuthorisedToApproveLeave.description: Boolean (true / false) – set this to true if the employee is authorised to approve other employees’ leave requests

IsAuthorisedToApproveTimesheets.description: Booelan – set this to true if the employee is authorised to approve timesheets

Classification.description: Employees under an award scheme will be covered by a modern award classification. If you record a classification, it will be included on your payslips (max length = 100)

OrdinaryEarningsRateID.description: Xero unique identifier for earnings rate

PayrollCalendarID.description: Xero unique identifier for payroll calendar for the employee

EmployeeGroupName.description: The Employee Group allows you to report on payroll expenses and liabilities for each group of employees

EmployeeID.description: Xero unique identifier for an Employee

AddressLine1.description: Address line 1 for employee home address (max length = 50)

AddressLine2.description: Address line 2 for employee home address (max length = 50)

City.description: Suburb for employee home address (max length = 50)

Region.description: State abbreviation for employee home address

PostalCode.description: PostCode for employee home address (max length = 4)

AustralianResidentForTaxPurposes.description: If the employee is Australian resident for tax purposes. e.g true or false

TaxFreeThresholdClaimed.description: If tax free threshold claimed. e.g true or false

TaxOffsetEstimatedAmount.description: If has tax offset estimated then the tax offset estimated amount. e.g 100

HasHELPDebt.description: If employee has HECS or HELP dept. e.g true or false

HasSFSSDebt.description: If employee has financial supplement dept. e.g true or false

HasTradeSupportLoanDebt.description: If employee has trade support loan. e.g true or false

UpwardVariationTaxWithholdingAmount.description: If the employee has requested that additional tax be withheld each pay run. e.g 50

EligibleToReceiveLeaveLoading.description: If the employee is eligible to receive an additional percentage on top of ordinary earnings when they take leave (typically 17.5%). e.g true or false

ApprovedWithholdingVariationPercentage.description: If the employee has approved withholding variation. e.g (0 – 100)

StatementText.description: The text that will appear on your employee’s bank statement when they receive payment (max length = 18)

AccountName.description: The name of the account (max length = 32)

BSB.description: The BSB number of the account (length = 6)

Remainder.description: If this account is the Remaining bank account

Amount.description: Fixed amounts (for example, if an employee wants to have $100 of their salary transferred to one account, and the remaining amount to another)

NumberOfUnitsPerWeek.description: Hours per week for the EarningsLine. Applicable for ANNUALSALARY CalculationType

RatePerUnit.description: Rate per unit of the EarningsLine.

NormalNumberOfUnits.description: Normal number of units for EarningsLine.  Applicable when RateType is “MULTIPLE”

Percentage.description: The percentage of the SuperLine. Applies on Percentage of Earnings CalculationType.

Amount.description: The amount of the reimbursement type

ExpenseAccountCode.description: Account code for the Expense Account. i.e 478

LiabilityAccountCode.description: Account code for the Liability Account. i.e 826

MinimumMonthlyEarnings.description: Minimum monthly earnings. Applies for Percentage of Earnings calculation type only

Description.description: The description of the reimbursement type

AnnualNumberOfUnits.description: Hours of leave accrued each year

FullTimeNumberOfUnitsPerPeriod.description: Normal ordinary earnings number of units for leave line.

NumberOfUnits.description: Number of units for leave line.

EntitlementFinalPayPayoutType.description: See Final Pay Payout Types If you do not provide any value then by Default it will be NOTPAIDOUT.

LeaveName.description: The name of the leave type

LeaveTypeID.description: Identifier of the leave type (see PayItems)

NumberOfUnits.description: The balance of the leave available

TypeOfUnits.description: The type of units as specified by the LeaveType (see PayItems)

EmployeeNumber.description: The memberhsip number assigned to the employee by the super fund.

SuperMembershipID.description: Xero unique identifier for Super membership

EmployeeID.description: The Xero identifier for an employee e.g. 297c2dc5-cc47-4afd-8ec8-74990b8761e9
The Xero identifier for Payroll Employee

LeaveTypeID.description: The Xero identifier for Leave Type

Title.description: The title of the leave (max length = 50)

Description.description: The Description of the Leave (max length = 200)

NumberOfUnits.description: The Number of Units for the leave

Name.description: Name of the earnings rate (max length = 100)

TypeOfUnits.description: Type of units used to record earnings (max length = 50). Only When RateType is RATEPERUNIT

IsExemptFromTax.description: Most payments are subject to tax, so you should only set this value if you are sure that a payment is exempt from PAYG withholding

IsExemptFromSuper.description: See the ATO website for details of which payments are exempt from SGC

RatePerUnit.description: Default rate per unit (optional). Only applicable if RateType is RATEPERUNIT.

Multiplier.description: This is the multiplier used to calculate the rate per unit, based on the employee’s ordinary earnings rate. For example, for time and a half enter 1.5. Only applicable if RateType is MULTIPLE

AccrueLeave.description: Indicates that this earnings rate should accrue leave. Only applicable if RateType is MULTIPLE

Amount.description: Option Amount for FIXEDAMOUNT RateType EarningsRate

Name.description: Name of the deduction type (max length = 50)

ReducesTax.description: Indicates that this is a pre-tax deduction that will reduce the amount of tax you withhold from an employee.

ReducesSuper.description: Most deductions don’t reduce your superannuation guarantee contribution liability, so typically you will not set any value for this.

Name.description: Name of the leave type (max length = 50)

TypeOfUnits.description: The type of units by which leave entitlements are normally tracked. These are typically the same as the type of units used for the employee’s ordinary earnings rate

IsPaidLeave.description: Set this to indicate that an employee will be paid when taking this type of leave

ShowOnPayslip.description: Set this if you want a balance for this leave type to be shown on your employee’s payslips

NormalEntitlement.description: The number of units the employee is entitled to each year

LeaveLoadingRate.description: Enter an amount here if your organisation pays an additional percentage on top of ordinary earnings when your employees take leave (typically 17.5%)

Name.description: Name of the reimbursement type (max length = 50)
Name of the Payroll Calendar (max length = 100)

StartDate.description: The start date of the upcoming pay period. The end date will be calculated based upon this date, and the calendar type selected (YYYY-MM-DD), more details.

PaymentDate.description: The date on which employees will be paid for the upcoming pay period (YYYY-MM-DD), more details.

EmployeeID.description: The Xero identifier for a Payroll Calendar e.g. 297c2dc5-cc47-4afd-8ec8-74990b8761e9

PayRunID.description: The Xero identifier for a Pay run e.g. 297c2dc5-cc47-4afd-0000-74990b8761e9

PayRunPeriodStartDate.description: Period Start Date for the PayRun (YYYY-MM-DD)

PayRunPeriodEndDate.description: Period End Date for the PayRun (YYYY-MM-DD)

Wages.description: The Total Wages for the PayRun

Deductions.description: The Total Deductions for the PayRun

NetPay.description: The Total NetPay for the PayRun

Tax.description: The Total Tax for the PayRun

Super.description: The Total Super for the PayRun

Reimbursements.description: The Total Reimbursement for the PayRun

EarningsRateID.description: Xero identifier for payroll earnings rate.

RatePerUnit.description: Rate per unit for earnings rate.

FixedAmount.description: Earnings rate amount.  Only applicable if the EarningsRate RateType is Fixed

EarningsRateID.description: Xero identifier for payroll earnings rate.

RatePerUnit.description: Rate per unit for earnings rate.

EarningsRateID.description: Xero identifier for payroll earnings rate.

RatePerUnit.description: Rate per unit for earnings rate

Amount.description: The Amount of the Timesheet Earnings Line.

DeductionTypeID.description: Xero identifier for payroll earnings rate.

CalculationType.description: Rate per unit for earnings rate.

Percentage.description: The Percentage of the Deduction Line.

LeaveTypeID.description: Xero identifier for the Leave type.

NumberOfUnits.description: Number of units for the Leave line.

AutoCalculate.description: If you want to auto calculate leave.

ReimbursementTypeID.description: Xero identifier for payroll reimbursement type

ExpenseAccount.description: Reimbursement expense account. For posted pay run you should be able to see expense account code

SuperMembershipID.description: Xero identifier for payroll super fund membership ID

PaymentDateForThisPeriod.description: Superannuation payment date for the current period (YYYY-MM-DD)

LiabilityAccount.description: The tax line liability account code. For posted pay run you should be able to see liability account code

PayslipID.description: The Xero identifier for a Pay slip e.g. GET https://…/Payslip/{identifier}

Accounts.description: Payroll Account details for SuperExpense, SuperLiabilty, WagesExpense, PAYGLiability & WagesPayable.  See Accounts

TrackingCategories.description: Tracking categories for Employee’s and Timesheet’s.  See Tracking Categories

DaysInPayrollYear.description: Number of days in the Payroll year

TrackingCategoryID.description: Xero tracking category identifier. e.g c56b19ef-75bf-45e8-98a4-e699a96609f7

ABN.description: ABN of the self managed super fund. (max length = 11) e.g 839182848805

USI.description: The USI of the Regulated SuperFund

Name.description: Name of the super fund (max length = 76) e.g Clive Monk Superannuation Fund

BSB.description: BSB of the self managed super fund. (max length = 6) e.g 123123

AccountNumber.description: The account number for the self managed super fund. (max length = 9) e.g 234324324

AccountName.description: The account name for the self managed super fund (max length = 32) e.g Clive Monk Superannuation Fund

ElectronicServiceAddress.description: The electronic service address for the self managed super fund (max length = 16)

EmployerNumber.description: Some funds assign a unique number to each employer (max length = 20)

SPIN.description: The SPIN of the Regulated SuperFund. This field has been deprecated.  It will only be present for legacy superfunds.  New superfunds will not have a SPIN value.  The USI field should be used instead of SPIN

ABN.description: The ABN of the Regulated SuperFund (e.g 40022701955)

USI.description: The USI of the Regulated SuperFund (e.g 40022701955001)

SPIN.description: The SPIN of the Regulated SuperFund. (e.g NML0117AU) This field has been deprecated.  New superfunds will not have a SPIN value.  The USI field should be used instead of SPIN

ProductName.description: The name of the Regulated SuperFund

EmployeeID.description: The Xero identifier for an employee

TimesheetID.description: The Xero identifier for a Payroll Timesheet

EarningsRateID.description: The Xero identifier for an Earnings Rate

TrackingItemID.description: The Xero identifier for a Tracking Category <TrackingOptionID>. The <TrackingOptionID> must belong to the TrackingCategory selected as <TimesheetCategories> under Payroll Settings.

NumberOfUnits.description: Number of units of a Timesheet line

TimesheetID.description: The Xero identifier for a payroll timesheete.g. 297c2dc5-cc47-4afd-0000-74990b8761e9
